name: The Caverns Below (SeanFowke)
description:
Game I made for the 2021 Global Game Jam. The Caverns below is a 3D first person horror game where you navigate the maze using a light source you can activate. Doing so alerts the monster to your location so beware. This is my first time making a horror game. Hope you enjoy playing!

Controls:
Sprint = Left Shit
W,A,S,D = Move
Mouse = Look
Activate Light = Space

Warning: Game contains loud sounds.

Global Game Jam Submission Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/caverns-below-1
